description:
I am a French software engineer with a passion for low-level coding and have a tight grasp on the underlying process to achieve efficient code. I also love to look at every aspect of a problem and finally solve it with an elegant solution.
On my spare time, I enjoy doing personal projects on my own and explore interesting technologies.

But above all I aim at simplicity.

guidelines.title: Simplicity and Elegance
guidelines.description: Creating clear and elegant code, implementing complex features in a straightforward manner for maintainability.

guidelines.title: Iterative and Agile Approach
guidelines.description: Embracing an iterative and Agile development process to arrive at lasting solutions while meeting client needs effectively.

guidelines.title: Leveraging Existing Resources
guidelines.description: Maximizing efficiency by utilizing existing tools and knowledge, promoting a global perspective during development.

books.title: Books
books.description: I like to read here and there, mostly fantasy and sci-fi.

outdoor.title: Going outdoor
outdoor.description: I like to do some trekking, with a bike or on foot. Lastly I have tried some electric motocross, wich is the most fun vehicle I ever used :)

network-tomove.title: Network
network-tomove.description: Aside from programming I also studied networtking and security, from deployment to supervision.

software-blender.title: Blender
software-blender.description: I do some 3d design occasionally, I used a lot Blender game engine then that was a thing.

software-unreal.title: Unreal engine
software-unreal.description: I am starting to look more and more into this game engine (mostly to do some C++).
